tp:nomenclature.tp:taxon-name: Tachycines ( Gymnaeta ) liboensis Zhu, Chen & Shi, 2020

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Tachycines ( Gymnaeta ) liboensis Zhu, Chen & Shi, 2020: 73
.

CHINA • 1 ♂ , Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region , Huanjiang County , Chuanshan Village , Xiarong Hamlet , Shuiyuan Cave ;
4 Oct. 2016
; Ming-Yi Tian , Ju-Jian Chen , Xin-Hui Wang , Ming-Ruo Tang , Dian-Mei Wang , Zhuang-Hui Qin and Rui-Chong Wang leg.; HBU
•
1 ♀ ; Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region , Huanjiang County , Chuanshan Village , Xiarong Hamlet , The Second Cave ;
6 Oct. 2016
; Ming- Yi Tian , Ju-Jian Chen , Xin-Hui Wang , Ming-Ruo Tang , Dian-Mei Wang , Zhuang-Hui Qin and Rui- Chong Wang leg.; HBU
.

Ovipositor nearly equal in length to half the length of hind femur, slightly curved upward, dorsal margin smooth, apical area of ventral margin denticulate. Subgenital plate nearly triangular, both sides of basal area with one triangular lobe, apex blunt.

Body length: ♂ : 18.0, ♀ : 18.0; length of pronotum: ♂ : 5.5–6.0, ♀ : 5.0; length of fore femur: ♂ : 14.3– 15.0, ♀ : 12.2; length of hind femur: ♂ : 26.5–27.0, ♀ : 23.0; length of hind tibia: ♂ : 30.0–31.0, ♀ : 27.0; length of hind basitarsus: ♂ : 6.0, ♀ : 5.0; length of ovipositor: 11.8.
The female of this species is recorded and described here for the first time.
